item.title: Here Are All The Ways DEI-Crazed Officials Made The LA Fire More Deadly
item.description: Los Angeles has lost sight of the reason fire departments exist.

item.title: LA Already Shipped Firefighting Equipment To Ukraine, And Now Biden Is Planning Another Handout As California Burns
item.description: Democrats have been more focused on slashing the fire department budget and sending equipment and money to Ukraine than saving Americans.

item.title: Senior Interior Officials Unilaterally Take Over Idaho Land Appeals Cases In 11th-Hour Power Grab
item.description: Former Alaska Attorney General Greg Renkes, who previously served on an appeals board, called the move 'unprecedented.'
